resources.string: "Your tablet isn't connected to a mobile data service. To view this information now, go to %s in a web browser."

Touch Activate" to activate your mobile service now. (It may take a couple of minutes.)
Or touch "Skip to set up your tablet using a Wi-Fi connection instead.

"Until you activate your mobile data service, most of your tablet's features won't work.
If you prefer to skip now, you can activate later in System Settings."

"Your mobile data service couldn't be activated. This may be a temporary problem.
If you prefer to skip now, be sure to activate later in System Settings. Until you activate, most of your tablet's features won't work."
"Your mobile data service couldn't be activated. This may be a temporary problem and may be solved by restarting the tablet."

There was an error that requires shutting down and restarting your tablet before you can make another activation attempt. Your tablet will shut down automatically in 60 seconds or you can touch Shut down now".
Once your tablet is shut down, press the Power button to restart it."
To insert your SIM card, read the instructions that came with your tablet.
Your tablet is set up and ready to use.
